name: Pestilent Tides
text:
Pestilent Tides’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus the number of Tides you control.

Flood {2}{b}{b} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{b}{b} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)

Whenever you flood Pestilent Tides, you may search your library for a card named Poisoned Tides, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
